casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2003-0967. Cleveland Mun. School Dist. Bd. of Edn. v. Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Cuyahoga App. No. 81507, 2003-Ohio-1728. Reported at 100 Ohio St.3d 1537, 2003-Ohio-6733, 800 N.E.2d 371.

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for reconsideration in this case be, and hereby is, denied.
